arez.networkstatus - package arez.networkstatus

create() - Static method in class arez.networkstatus.NetworkStatus

G

getLastChangedAt() - Method in class arez.networkstatus.NetworkStatus

I

isOnLine() - Method in class arez.networkstatus.NetworkStatus
Return true if the browser is online, false otherwise.

N

NetworkStatus - Class in arez.networkstatus
An observable model that declares state that tracks when the user is "online".
